name: Mitigation Playbook for HTTP-Based C2 Communications
description: This playbook addresses an incident where abnormal HTTP traffic patterns indicate potential communication with a command and control server.

action--3b28e9d4-c5fc-427c-bb3d-36c925dd.name: Block outbound traffic to known malicious IPs
action--3b28e9d4-c5fc-427c-bb3d-36c925dd.description: Block all outbound connections to known malicious IPs associated with the command and control server.

action--cb3f1c89-4c32-447f-8361-4f908fdd.name: Kill unauthorized processes
action--cb3f1c89-4c32-447f-8361-4f908fdd.description: Terminate any process that is making unauthorized connections based on the attack logs.
action--cb3f1c89-4c32-447f-8361-4f908fdd.condition: if $(pgrep -f <process_name>); then return 0; else return 1; fi

while-condition--f4c7e8ac-db4a-46ea-931d.name: Perform system scan until no threats found
while-condition--f4c7e8ac-db4a-46ea-931d.description: Perform a comprehensive system scan and repeat until no threats are detected.

action--f4c7e8ac-db4a-46ea-931d-52590a46.name: Perform full system scan
action--f4c7e8ac-db4a-46ea-931d-52590a46.description: Execute a full system scan to identify any remaining threats.
